Title: Esther
Actors: Simone Benyamini, Mohammad Bakri, Juliano Mer-Khamis
Plot: Ahasverus, king of Persia and Media, puts aside Vashti and makes Esther his queen, choosing her among maidens in a kingdom stretching from India to Ethiopia. Esther, using information from Mordecai, her uncle and patron, saves the...
